Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-11187 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.20.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-11187 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.20.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package bind is earlier than 9.20.5-1, affected by CVE-2024-11187
